reviews.text: I went to eat here on Saturday and was pleased by the food and service by my server, Nancy. Throughout our meal, we kept getting interrupted by other servers, which gave off the vibe that we were being rushed. Being asked occasionally is okay and definitely more welcoming compared to being asked every 2 minutes. The restaurant is great and so was the service provided by Nancy, but this issue should be resolved between all staff.
A gem, food is insanely delicious, fresh and clean. Vibes are immaculate.

I have ordered delivery from here 3 times so far (both online and by phone), and the food is really tasty and fresh. Delivery has been quick. Portions are generous, and sauce is given on the side, so I can put on just the amount I want. I would definitely order from here again.

The prices, the food, the service, all great. I will say, the drinks were more sweet, than strong, but other than that üëåüèæ. We ordered queso with jalape√±os, which actually comes as a fondue with tortillas. It was soooo good. We ordered a three meat place that came with rice and beans, a steak burrito, al pastor taco, and quesadilla between the four of us. Everyone enjoyed their meals. They were big enough and tasted good.

I was there on Monday, and at the entrance to the bar, there was a group of very loud drunks with the music so loud it was impossible to hear my friends' conversations. It was a very unpleasant experience and disrespectful to all the customers when it's supposed to be a family atmosphere. I really hope the managers of this establishment do something about it and prioritize their customers, not just their friends.

We been meaning to come here for a long time, knowing people who've come from another restaurant- and WOW! I'm so glad we did!! My drink was amazing!!! We had guacamole with chips, Jalape√±o poppers to start and our entrees were, Salmon a Chipotle & Pollo ala Mexicana. Our food came fast, hot, and tasted perfect! Oh and we didn't know that Fridays are karaoke night!' Soo the music was great with very talented performers! Our waitress Syndy Maine  was friendly, thoughtful and professional, which makes us really want to come back again and again! And btw we've tried many Mexican restaurants and know great Mexican food- so if I say come here, it's because I highly recommend!!

Was in the area visiting and stopped by on a Friday early afternoon for lunch. We were greeted warmly and sat down immediately. The young lady tending to us was very nice. We all enjoyed our meals: order of al pastor tacos, chicken quesadilla, and steak burrito. They also give complimentary tortilla chips with salsa. The salsa is good - a little on the sweeter side but so good. If ever in the area again, I will definitely come again!

Came for lunch on a Saturday and had a delightful time! Such a cheerful interior, and very clean too. Our waitress was so sweet, and we ordered nachos and birria tacos - the birria and consomme were spot on and absolutely delicious. We can‚Äôt wait to be back!

I ordered from this place because of its great reviews, i got a steak quesadilla no onions or guacamole and sour cream with a lemonade, and it comes with rice and beans. When the food got here my drink and sour cream were missing. I tasted the rice and beans, and they were over cooked. The quesadilla was good , when I had called back to tell them what they forgot they said they would send it back when they did there was something weird in my drink I don‚Äôt know what it was, but I‚Äôm disgusted. When I called to tell the lady the issue she didn‚Äôt offer no type of refund. I understand we‚Äôre human and sometimes mistakes happen , but I did not enjoy ordering from this place.
